scripts.test-win: set NODE_ENV=test&& mocha --recursive --reporter spec test/unit/ packages/**/*.test.js
scripts.cover: npm run docs && npm run eslint && NODE_ENV=test istanbul --include-all-sources cover -x '**/docs/**' -x '**/node_modules/**' _mocha -- --recursive --reporter spec $(find packages -name '*.test.js'  -not -path '**/node_modules/**' )
scripts.cover-ilorm: npm run docs && npm run eslint && NODE_ENV=test istanbul --include-all-sources cover -x '**/docs/**' -x '**/node_modules/**' _mocha -- --recursive --reporter spec $(find packages/ilorm -name '*.test.js'  -not -path '**/node_modules/**' )
scripts.cover-win: set NODE_ENV=test&& istanbul --include-all-sources cover -x public/** -x config/** -x index.js -x packages/**/*.test.js node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/unit/ packages/**/*.test.js
scripts.circle_ci_test: lerna bootstrap && npm run eslint && istanbul --include-all-sources cover  -x '**/docs/**' --dir $CIRCLE_ARTIFACTS _mocha -- --recursive $(find packages -name '*.test.js'  -not -path '**/node_modules/**' )
